findings.details: Added stable scrollbar gutter for mobile breadcrumb overflow to avoid layout shift when scrollbars appear.
Manual scan of repo links did not reveal placeholder URLs (example.com). External URLs not live-checked due to offline audit.
SEO tag, description, and social metadata remain consistent across templates.
Reading progress indicator now exposes aria-valuetext for screen readers.

recommendations: Consider running an online link checker to validate external news URLs.
Continue monitoring mobile UX for long breadcrumb titles.
